body: Make the mom fuck the son first then get her fucked by his friend...I mean this isn't even netorare because the mom and son are not sexual partners...Most hentai artists don't seem to get this point...I hope some great hentai artist has enough brains to come up with a story like that

People asking why most cuck artists draw ugly bastards in NTR. Well, to make it simple, it's to make some ugly dudes out there to feel better and it's something they could relate. If they're a loser IRL, atleast they are winning on hentai doujins. LMFAO
Why make the dude so fucking ugly. You are essentially covering about 10-20% of most panels with the human equivalent of a shit stain.
